metadata.title: Universal Kriging Configuration
metadata.author: Barron H. Henderson
metadata.Notes: All options are for pykrige and fusion of pykrige surfaces. Ranges are based on expert knowledge.

field_definitions.longitude_center: Dividing line for West/East; units: degrees east
field_definitions.latitude_center: Dividing line for South/North; units: degrees north
field_definitions.urban_minimum_density: grid cells with people/km**2 less than urban_minimum density are rural
field_definitions.variogram_parameters: range is set by other parameters, but psill and nuggest are set here
field_definitions.query_definitions: definitions used to filter AQS sites/observatiosn can rely on latitude, longitude, population_density (#/km2), and any standard AQS field
field_definitions.query_gridcell_ranges: range for sill and nugget to match definitions
field_definitions.urban_blend: variable used ('var') to calculate fractional use of urban kriged surface where 0 is at value ('0') and 1 is at value ('1').
field_definitions.east_blend: Same as urban_blend, but for east.
field_definitions.north_blend: Same as urban_blend, but for north.
field_definitions.obs_path: Path where observatiosn can be found.
field_definitions.pop_path: Population density file (must have DENS variable).
field_definitions.model_template: strftime with for using date to constructe file path
field_definitions.domain: Domain key (e.g., 12US1, 12US2, 36US3), which must be defined in griddesc_path
